name: Seferis@Vikelaia
description:
This interactive application is made to promote the Giorgos & Maro Seferis Archive in Vikelaia Municipal Library in Heraklion Crete. It is still in development.

Instructions: Follow the mermaid to discover about the poet and the journey of the archive from Agras 20 (Athens) to Vikelaia (Heraklion).
